message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is too low for me. How about we settle at $13,500? It's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000? I'm willing to make a serious offer and finalize the deal.
